<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A scalar floating-point function to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Accept a floating-point scalar (``x``) to the input port and transform it according to [function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_property_function).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

    </tr>

[Function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_Function) **FUNC_SATURATE** = `18`

Clamps the value between ``0.0`` and ``1.0`` using ``min(max(x, 0.0), 1.0)``.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_constant_FUNC_NEGATE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_Function) **FUNC_RECIPROCAL** = `28`

Finds reciprocal value of dividing 1 by ``x`` (i.e. ``1 / x``).<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_constant_FUNC_ROUNDEVEN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_Function) **FUNC_ROUNDEVEN** = `29`

Finds the nearest even integer to the parameter. Translates to ``roundEven(x)`` in the GodotShader Language.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_constant_FUNC_TRUNC"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_Function) **FUNC_TRUNC** = `30`

Returns a value equal to the nearest integer to ``x`` whose absolute value is not larger than the absolute value of ``x``. Translates to ``trunc(x)`` in the GodotShader Language.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_constant_FUNC_ONEMINUS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_Function) **FUNC_ONEMINUS** = `31`

Subtracts scalar ``x`` from 1 (i.e. ``1 - x``).<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_constant_FUNC_MAX"></a>

[Function](class_visualshadernodefloatfunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeFloatFunc_Function) **FUNC_MAX** = `32`
